mapper.insert: SELECT TOA_ARCHIVE_READINFO_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO toa_archive_readinfo(ID,TOA_ID,DOCUMENT_ID,KM_USER_ID,KM_READTIME,KM_FIRSTREAD,KM_LASTREAD,KM_READ_FLAG,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,WEIGHT,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,EXT_DATE1,EXT_DATE2,EXT_NUM1,EXT_NUM2,EXT_NUM3,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5) VALUES (#{id},#{toaId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{documentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{kmUserId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{kmReadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{kmFirstread,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{kmLastread,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{kmReadFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extNum1,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_archive_readinfo set
TOA_ID = #{toaId},
DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId},
KM_USER_ID = #{kmUserId},
KM_READTIME = #{kmReadtime},
KM_FIRSTREAD = #{kmFirstread},
KM_LASTREAD = #{kmLastread},
KM_READ_FLAG = #{kmReadFlag},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
